SELECT COUNT(item.ITEM_GROUP_CODE) AS articleTotalNum FROM ITEM item, BRAND brand, ITEM_CATEGORY cate WHERE item.ITEM_USE_YN='Y' AND item.BRAND_CODE=brand.BRAND_CODE AND cate.ITEM_GROUP_CODE = item.ITEM_GROUP_CODE
AND (item.ITEM_NAME LIKE '%$keyWord$%' OR brand.BRAND_NAME LIKE '%$keyWord$%')
AND cate.CATEGORY3_CODE=#cateCode#

SELECT item.ITEM_CODE AS itemCode, item.ITEM_GROUP_CODE AS itemGroupCode, item.ITEM_SIZE_YN AS itemSizeYn, item.ITEM_STATUS AS itemStatus, item.ITEM_SCORE AS itemScore, stock.STOCK_MARKET_PRICE AS itemMarketPrice, stock.STOCK_SELL_PRICE AS itemSellPrice, item.ITEM_PIC_PATH as itemPicPath, item.ITEM_PIC_SAVENAME as itemPicSavename, (stock.STOCK_SELL_PRICE/stock.STOCK_MARKET_PRICE*100) as itemDiscount, item.ITEM_NAME AS itemName, brand.BRAND_NAME as brandName, COUNT(review.POSTING_CODE) AS reviewCnt FROM BRAND brand, ITEM_CATEGORY cate, ITEM_STOCK stock, ITEM item left join (SELECT POSTING_CODE, ITEM_CODE FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_USE_YN='Y') review on item.ITEM_CODE=review.ITEM_CODE WHERE item.BRAND_CODE = brand.BRAND_CODE AND cate.ITEM_GROUP_CODE = item.ITEM_GROUP_CODE AND stock.ITEM_CODE = item.ITEM_CODE
AND (item.ITEM_NAME LIKE '%$keyWord$%' OR brand.BRAND_NAME LIKE '%$keyWord$%')
AND cate.CATEGORY3_CODE=#cateCode#
GROUP BY item.ITEM_CODE, item.ITEM_GROUP_CODE, item.ITEM_SIZE_YN, item.ITEM_STATUS, item.ITEM_SCORE, stock.STOCK_MARKET_PRICE, stock.STOCK_SELL_PRICE, item.ITEM_PIC_PATH, item.ITEM_PIC_SAVENAME, (stock.STOCK_SELL_PRICE/stock.STOCK_MARKET_PRICE*100), item.ITEM_NAME, brand.BRAND_NAME;
